alert.note: Alert for Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 30 at 5:19PM CDT until May 30 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Wadena County in central Minnesota... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Staples Airport, or 55 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Verndale, Staples Airport, Aldrich and Oylen. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
